segments.text: How long has the company been in business ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For over forty years . The original company Davies Engineering - was founded in 1960 by the Davies brothers in a small workshop near Manchester . They closed down the workshop in 1980 and opened up a new factory in Leeds .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In 1997 - when it was bought by a German company . They set up two more business in the UK .
segments.speaker: S2
